comments.body: The indirection here might be a bit overkill. I started having both ids and name/version pairs and dropped the former once I realized that this breaks because the compiler wonâ€™t pick it up. Given that I expect we want to add it I kept the indirection but also happy to remove it if someone prefers.
this change is also going to affect java codegen... and the SDK doc, that does not mention `root`.

@leo-da so should I take the option out of the CLI/config, or just declare it as unsupported for java?
I do think it is a very useful option.
